name: Buggy Bots
description:
Info

You don't know who you are, you don't know where you're at. But since you're here, why not help out your fellow robot Bob? Observe Bob's pre-programmed sequence of moves and define your own programming to help him complete his task. Tag along as Bob moves to the next area, and maybe you'll find clues to the reason you became a robot.

This game is a submission to One Game A Month #13 with the theme Dynamic Duo as well as to Geekfest Top End and was developed by a team of five during June '22.

NOTE: Unfortunately, the circumstances didn't allow us to put hand-crafted art assets into the game, so we had to stick with the originally placed 3rd party placeholders. However, please do check out the screenshots of the art in the BONUS section!

How to play

Your job is to help Bob deliver the battery to the receiver.

  • Click PLAY to let the scenario play out.
  • OBSERVE Bob and figure out how to help him.
  • Click RESET to try it yourself.
  • CLICK THE COMMAND to add it to your sequence of actions.
  • Click PLAY again to execute your commands.
  • Click RESET to try again.
Controls
  • Mouse only
